gear.name: Silicone molds or ice cube tray

cookingTips: Mix ingredients while coconut oil is warm for smooth blending
Fill molds evenly and freeze for at least 2 hours until solid
Store in freezer and pop out as needed - they melt quickly at room temperature
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Would you like to add any flavor variations like peppermint extract, sea salt, or espresso powder?
